comments.author: o48o
comments.body: I accidentlly stubled upon this ann, and skimmed your whitepaper and i have to sat it looks interesting. So i want to ask that how can i join to private sale, and about your marketing strategy; do you perhaps have signature bounties / marketing bounties in the future?

comments.author: AnuuTech Layer 1 Project
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on July 19, 2022, 07:50:09 AMI accidentlly stubled upon this ann, and skimmed your whitepaper and i have to sat it looks interesting. So i want to ask that how can i join to private sale, and about your marketing strategy; do you perhaps have signature bounties / marketing bounties in the future?Thank you for your inquiry.Did you have a chance to visit our website? We offer our technical documentation in both a technical and non-technical format. (www.anuutech.com)We are close to completing our Seed round, and seats are taken quickly. This will lead us to Private Round 1. You can still be a part of the Seed investing group by filling in the sign-up form on our website.We will utilize many marketing methods to reach a greater audience in the future, bounties only being one of the many. If you have more specific questions or would like to meet with our team members, please contact us at contact@anuutech.com

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: For an ordinary crypto user, can you give what are the benefits of this project?Because you need to attract large number of users to sustain your project in this market. How can you endorse it to small players in this industry? Do they have usage for this platform?As there are so many crypto projects existing today, most of them ended up only in the trading section,but usually, their actual use case is forgotten once they started trading in the market.

comments.author: AnuuTech Layer 1 Project
comments.body: Quote from: TimeTeller on July 20, 2022, 11:52:38 PMFor an ordinary crypto user, can you give what are the benefits of this project?Because you need to attract large number of users to sustain your project in this market. How can you endorse it to small players in this industry? Do they have usage for this platform?As there are so many crypto projects existing today, most of them ended up only in the trading section,but usually, their actual use case is forgotten once they started trading in the market.AnuuTech is a blockchain company specializing in Data Integrity protection. We are working towards creating a platform that can help enterprises and ordinary users precisely; make sure their transacted data is delivered or received intact and safe from unauthorized, unconfirmed changes. Legal documentation (including those coming from lawyers or notaries); databases of any type (patient db or supply chain db); contracts of any type (private property or employment ones); NFTs; video, image or audio metadata; all fall under the broad term "data" .Everyone utilizing our technology can benefit from it, provided their transacted data is first fed to the AnuuTech blockchain. But we do not stop there. Provided that corporations adopt our technology, it could help individuals stay protected from phishing links since they would immediately know if they have received an email with altered data from an impostor. AnuuTech protection extends to identity theft or fake accounts from deceivers posing as someone else (a company's CEO, a lawyer, a news company or a contractor, to name a few). AnuuTech is also able to enhance online shopping, online betting and online gaming experience. And can also work as the ultimate layer of protection on top of one's antivirus program. In our network, the ordinary cryptocurrency user can verify the transactions instead of having the nodes do this for him. It is up to the user to choose how far back into the chain they want to check the integrity of the transacted coins. Because the coins are only transferred when the end-user accepts them, a transaction can be cancelled, which is unique in the crypto world. It makes the technology much more user-friendly.There is no more fear of losing coins when you mistype a character or hit that enter key a little too early. AnuuTech's Use Case Proof of Hash is already a beta Proof of Concept running on our network. "As there are so many crypto projects existing today, most of them ended up only in the trading section, but usually, their actual use case is forgotten once they started trading in the market."That Use Case is not forgotten.

Hope to see huge number of crypto users using your network.Most of the time, the concept is great, but when it comes to implementation, that's when the project will start seeing the bottlenecks upon its actual application.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: AnuuTech Layer 1 Project on July 21, 2022, 03:26:03 PMIn our network, the ordinary cryptocurrency user can verify the transactions instead of having the nodes do this for him. It is up to the user to choose how far back into the chain they want to check the integrity of the transacted coins. Because the coins are only transferred when the end-user accepts them, a transaction can be cancelled, which is unique in the crypto world. It makes the technology much more user-friendly.There is no more fear of losing coins when you mistype a character or hit that enter key a little too early. Can you explain this part more? How safe do you think the transaction can be with this excess, especially for the end-user? If all ordinary users without special efforts such as having high computing power could verify transactions, wouldn't they be able to fool the network?Or is it similar to stellar, using some sort of "memo"?Please explain as simply as possible to non-technical users.

comments.author: AnuuTech Layer 1 Project
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on August 01, 2022, 07:35:36 PMQuote from: AnuuTech Layer 1 Project on July 21, 2022, 03:26:03 PMIn our network, the ordinary cryptocurrency user can verify the transactions instead of having the nodes do this for him. It is up to the user to choose how far back into the chain they want to check the integrity of the transacted coins. Because the coins are only transferred when the end-user accepts them, a transaction can be cancelled, which is unique in the crypto world. It makes the technology much more user-friendly.There is no more fear of losing coins when you mistype a character or hit that enter key a little too early. Can you explain this part more? How safe do you think the transaction can be with this excess, especially for the end-user? If all ordinary users without special efforts such as having high computing power could verify transactions, wouldn't they be able to fool the network?Or is it similar to stellar, using some sort of "memo"?Please explain as simply as possible to non-technical users.Thank you for your inquiry.The network relies on our PoH technology to create new blocks and transaction templates. Therefore we always know which transactions are valid without having to run post-checks by our nodes. After the valid transaction has been started, before the users accepts it, we give the receiver the possibility to go through the block explorer that lines up the history of the tokens he just received. We provide the basic layer of security on our Private Chain technology for the end users (against forking, double spending, hashing collisions, ...), the only thing they have to do a final check to make sure the transaction looks "normal" and then accept, in other words there's no need for computing power of our end users in order to use our chain.

comments.author: AnuuTech Layer 1 Project
comments.created_time: September 04, 2022, 03:52:45 PMLast edit: February 24, 2024, 09:40:03 PM by AnuuTech Layer 1 Project
comments.body: We have now created our private $AKEY blockchain!  -  https://github.com/AnuuTech/PoH_PoC/releases/tag/v0.3.0New features:· Private AKEY Blockchain created. Based on BESU client, using QBFT consensus.· A RPC service is available for both nodes and external clients· Service provided by the network (Chat, PoH and Data storage) now require a fee pre-payment· Fees payments are done in an escrow-like smart contract, mentionning the hash of the msg to be sent to the AnuuTech network· When a msg has been sent with incorrect fees, a returning message explains the issue to the client· A faucet website has been developed for getting test AKEY· A first version of a service fee management decentralized App is available· Basic client now offers basic wallet service to interact with the AKEY blockchain (create account/balance/send)· Basic client now shares the same settings file with nodes· Default nodes are now obtained through two independent DNS entries/dynamicDNS· Services now wait that basic net_maintenance service has fully started before startingResourcesFor more information on our development progress please visit https://github.com/AnuuTech/PoH_PoC/releasesFor our latest news, announcements or in order to find out how Proof of Hash can help individuals or corporations, please join https://t.me/AnuuTech AnuuTech White Paper: https://www.anuutech.com/files/AnuuTech_Whitepaper.pdfAnuuTech Investor Deck: https://www.anuutech.com/files/AnuuTech_Investor_Deck.pdfProof of Hash Simplified explanation: https://www.anuutech.com/files/AnuuTech_PoH_Simplified.pdfProof of Hash Detailed explanation: https://www.anuutech.com/files/AnuuTech_PoH.pdfProof of Hash Full Explanatory Diagram Part 1Proof of Hash Full Explanatory Diagram Part 2

comments.body: Our modular technology makes it possible to create bridges between blockchains.AnuuTech can now validate multiple chains & compare transactions occurring on those chains. Tokens can be swapped for other tokens, without going through a selling stage.AnuuTech specializes in Data Integrity - we developed processes that ensure your data is kept consistent and accurate throughout its lifecycle.Our modular technology can be used in the following industries:­· Urban planning· Education· Legal· Share trading· Aviation· Supply Chain· Healthcare· Online Gaming / Online Shopping· Voting· FinanceWe keep your business data SAFE!Interested to learn more or invest in our modular technology? Drop us a message at contact@anuutech.com and our team will reach you!

comments.author: AnuuTech Layer 1 Project
comments.created_time: September 25, 2022, 07:48:34 AMLast edit: February 24, 2024, 09:37:22 PM by AnuuTech Layer 1 Project
comments.body: Imagine…Imagine a technology that warns you every time your transacted legal document has been sent back to you in an altered form, without you knowing it.Think of an ever-vigilant entity, able to be installed on top of every existing antivirus program, making sure that the file you download has not been tampered with.Visualize a strategic partner that is there for you, every time you need to discern whether you have received a genuine email from a trusted source (be it a company's CEO or your bank's prompt to update your login credentials) or from a fraudulent / scamming group of imposters.Picture a trusted friend consistently running to your aid when your Healthcare establishment, Logistics company, Finance institution, Voting platform or Supply Chain enterprise needs to safely transact your customers' private information without exposing it to the network.And envision an innovative ecosystem where you have total control over your transacted cryptocurrency assets, even when you have mistakenly sent them to a wrong address, due to a single character mistype. Cryptocurrency transaction cancellations and/or reclaiming have never been possible before - until now.Welcome to AnuuTech Ltd.AnuuTech is a blockchain company built from the ground up with an entirely modular concept in mind, and bringing a unique, innovative way in how transacted data is validated and protected.Our modular technology consists of 4 building blocks, each having its own individual documentation, available on our website (https://www.anuutech.com/). These 4 building blocks act synergistic to guarantee that any type of data transacted through our ecosystem, cannot be modified or corrupted during transfer, intentionally or otherwise, without being detected.These four building blocks are• Proof of Hash, our consensus algorithm which is well developed and for which a fully working prototype has already been created.• AnuuTech Network, a new multilayered, totally secure and scalable network solution, providing faster connections, functional groups and a modular solution for blockchain technologies.• AnuuTech ID, an advanced form of identification and access pass on the AnuuTech Network• Private Chains, offering our users the ability to create their own chain, one that will contain only data and transactions relevant to their addresses.Our proof of concept (the Proof of Hash technology) is already created.We invite you to a ZOOM call so we can demonstrate it to you live. Just drop us a mail at contact@anuutech.com and our team of professionals will be quick to respond back.You can think of Proof of Hash as an extension of every possible program, website or application, an integrated code weaved into third-party systems if you prefer, which function as the ultimate layer of protection individuals or companies will ever need to safely transact their data.Modularity is the core value behind our technology. This means that it offers for virtually any type of data to be transacted through our network, totally safe from modification (intentionally or otherwise). And if modification of the transacted data does occur, Proof of Hash will be there to always detect it and warn you before you take any further action.Data can vary between, but not limited to:• a legal document (Real Estate deed, notary or lawyer contract, a private patient's database from a Healthcare establishment or their personal medical examination results, an employment hiring contract, an Education Institution database etc)• an NFT (even if your wallet gets hacked, you will be able to prove the ownership of your token). In comparison, buying an NFT is like buying a car without papers. PoH enables companies to create documents of ownership that are sent whenever the NFT is sold or transferred, making it much less appealing for hackers to steal NFTs.• a music's / video's / image's metadata• emails (we allow software companies to integrate PoH into their build that confirms the integrity of emails and their senders)When other companies use our technology, we have a business plan that will provide our investors and our company with income. Our method allows us to grow and continue our development into our other cornerstone technologies.We are looking for strategic partners who can add more value to our business.Do not hesitate to email us at contact@anuutech.com if you have any questions about our modular technology or you want to partner with us.We are also happy to have one-to-one ZOOM meetings with potential investors, where we can get to know each other and you can learn more about our project. Feel free to contact us today. ---RESOURCES• AnuuTech Proof of Concept documentation (Proof of Hash)    - detailed description : https://www.anuutech.com/files/AnuuTech_PoH.pdf   - non-technical description : https://www.anuutech.com/files/AnuuTech_PoH_Simplified.pdf• Dev explorer   - https://devexplorer.anuutech.com/
